                "i=0\nwhile [ $i -lt ${#arr[@]} ]; do\n    echo \"${arr[$i]}\"\n    i=$((i + 1))\ndone"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
